Jeremy Arde

I build systems that solve real problems.

Hashdown

Create forms using Markdown you already know. A complete SaaS with a custom parsing engine compiled to WebAssembly.

Uptime Monitor

Simple website monitoring that actually works. Built with Rust to handle thousands of concurrent checks efficiently.

Blackball

Multiplayer card game with real-time WebSocket communication. Built entirely in Rust from frontend to backend.
